dmca.title: Copyright Infringement...
dmca.body: -----Original Message----- From: Jeremy Panizzoli [mailto:jpwebsites@hotmail.com] Sent: Monday, June 27, 2005 9:05 PM To: copyright@theplanet.com Cc: admin@creditcard-approvals.com Subject: Copyright Infringement... Legal Department: A domain being hosted by your company is using COPYRIGHTED material from our Website. We have taken the appropriate steps to inform this party, but no action has been taken. This message serves as legal notice that http://www.creditcard-approvals.com at IP Address (69.93.246.42) is using copyrighted works owned by Big Z Networks, Inc. (http://www.wowcreditcards.com) without permission. This message meets all requirements for compliance with a DMCA Cease & Desist request. (i) My signature below serves as my legal electronic signature (ii) & (iii) The works being used are: "Credit Basics" http://www.creditcard-approvals.com/credit_basics.htm "Establish Credit" http://www.creditcard-approvals.com/credit_establish.htm "Maintain Credit" http://www.creditcard-approvals.com/credit_maintain.htm "Security/Fraud" http://www.creditcard-approvals.com/credit_security.htm "How to Choose a Credit Card" http://www.creditcard-approvals.com/credit_choose.htm "About Us" http://www.creditcard-approvals.com/about_us.htm "Credit Card Comparison Chart" http://www.creditcard-approvals.com/compare.htm AND EVERY "CREDIT CARD" PAGE ON OUR SITE!!!! (iv) You may reach me at (734) 578-3943 or at jpwebsites@hotmail.com if you have questions regarding this complaint. Our mailing address is: Big Z Networks, Inc. 708 Church Street Plymouth, MI 48170 -------------------------------------- We have informed http://www.creditcard-approvals.com that we will provide authorization if they cite these articles with "by WOW! Credit Cards" either before -or- after the content. This TEXT must be linked to http://www.wowcreditcards.com. EXAMPLE: by WOW! Credit Cards But this content has not been removed, and none of our work has been "cited". -------------------------------------- (v) We do not authorize the use, publication, performance or redisplay of our works without explicit permission. We have not shared usage rights for any of our copyrighted articles for use on http://www.creditcard-approvals.com or any other website owned or operated by SUNDAY OLATUNJI. As no rights have been given, this is a clear violation of our copyright. (vi) The information in this notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, I (Jeremy Panizzoli) am the owner of Big Z Networks, Inc. and exclusive owner of the rights for the works listed above. I appreciate your prompt response and action on this matter, [signature] Jeremy Panizzoli Big Z Networks, Inc. http://www.wowcreditcards.com [/signature]
